title: Ticket #1099: --without-gsoap broken
description:
When building with --without-gsoap on my laptop (openSUSE 11.2): 
make[1]: Entering directory `/home/nleroy/devel/condor/trunk/build/src/condor_schedd.V6'
g++ -I../condor_daemon_core.V6 -I. -I.. -I../.. -I../h -I../condor_includes -I../condor_c++_util -I../condor_daemon_client -I../condor_daemon_core.V6 -I../ccb -I../condor_io -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DX86_64=X86_64 -DLINUX=LINUX       -DWANT_LEASE_MANAGER -g  -pthread -g -Wall -W -Wextra -Wfloat-equal -Wshadow -Wendif-labels -Wpointer-arith -Wcast-qual -Wcast-align -Wvolatile-register-var -fstack-protector  -DGLIBC=GLIBC -DGLIBC29=GLIBC29 -DC_COMP_KIND_GCC -DC_COMP_MAJOR_GCC_4 -DC_COMP_MINOR_GCC_4_3 -DC_COMP_PATCH_GCC_4_3_2  -I/home/nleroy/devel/condor/trunk/build/externals/install/pcre-7.6/include  -pthread     -c ../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.cpp -o ../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.o
../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.cpp:27:22: error: stdsoap2.h: No such file or directory
In file included from ../condor_includes/condor_ast.h:66,
                 from ../condor_includes/condor_classad.h:30,
                 from ../condor_daemon_core.V6/condor_daemon_core.h:41,
                 from ../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.cpp:22:
../condor_includes/condor_astbase.h:135: warning: type qualifiers ignored on function return type
In file included from ../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.cpp:22:
../condor_daemon_core.V6/condor_daemon_core.h:76: warning: deprecated conversion from string constant to ‘char*’
../condor_daemon_core.V6/soap_core.cpp:45: error: expected initializer before ‘struct’
...
remarks:
2010-Jan-09 09:20:03 by matt:
How can you live without soap!?
